title: Reduce noise of logs for Transition pivot selector and pivot selector for finalized block and FastSyncActions to TRACE

labels.name: dev experience
labels.description: The build system, things that enable easier development etc.

body:
<!-- Have you done the following? -->
<!--   * read the Code of Conduct? By filing an Issue, you are expected to -->  
<!--     comply with it, including treating everyone with respect: -->
<!--     https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md -->
<!--   * Reproduced the issue in the latest version of the software -->
<!--   * Read the debugging docs: https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/HowTo/Monitor/Logging/ -->
<!--   * Duplicate Issue check:  https://github.com/search?q=+is%3Aissue+repo%3Ahyperledger/Besu -->
<!-- Note:  Not all sections will apply to all issue types. -->

### Description
As a user, I want more coherent logs that do not get spammed from the CL during a Snap Sync. The following logs should be toned down to TRACE. 

2022-07-27 17:05:13.948-04:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-2 | INFO  | FastSyncActions | Successfully downloaded pivot block header by hash: 12676158 (0x3f762cb5232c908749e23efa35a06ed6790850549a319697c83c8f8bb3999cb7)
2022-07-27 17:05:13.952-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | TransitionPivotSelector | A finalized block is present, use it as pivot
2022-07-27 17:05:13.952-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | PivotSelectorFromFinalizedBlock | Returning finalized block hash as pivot: 0x3f762cb5232c908749e23efa35a06ed6790850549a319697c83c8f8bb3999cb7
2022-07-27 17:05:13.952-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | DynamicPivotBlockManager | Select new pivot block 12676158 0x4106db397a60bffd586c61d76a7d7f6e5e5b6293616fe990f07277bf2de9351b
2022-07-27 17:05:14.065-04:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-10 | INFO  | FastSyncActions | Successfully downloaded pivot block header by hash: 12676158 (0x3f762cb5232c908749e23efa35a06ed6790850549a319697c83c8f8bb3999cb7)
2022-07-27 17:05:14.067-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | TransitionPivotSelector | A finalized block is present, use it as pivot
2022-07-27 17:05:14.068-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | PivotSelectorFromFinalizedBlock | Returning finalized block hash as pivot: 0x3f762cb5232c908749e23efa35a06ed6790850549a319697c83c8f8bb3999cb7
2022-07-27 17:05:14.068-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | DynamicPivotBlockManager | Select new pivot block 12676158 0x4106db397a60bffd586c61d76a7d7f6e5e5b6293616fe990f07277bf2de9351b
2022-07-27 17:05:14.182-04:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-10 | INFO  | FastSyncActions | Successfully downloaded pivot block header by hash: 12676158 (0x3f762cb5232c908749e23efa35a06ed6790850549a319697c83c8f8bb3999cb7)
2022-07-27 17:05:14.208-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | TransitionPivotSelector | A finalized block is present, use it as pivot
2022-07-27 17:05:14.208-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | PivotSelectorFromFinalizedBlock | Returning finalized block hash as pivot: 0x3f762cb5232c908749e23efa35a06ed6790850549a319697c83c8f8bb3999cb7
2022-07-27 17:05:14.208-04:00 | EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock) | INFO  | DynamicPivotBlockManager | Select new pivot block 12676158 0x4106db397a60bffd586c61d76a7d7f6e5e5b6293616fe990f07277bf2de9351b


**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]
Just snap sync logs print

**Actual behavior:** [What actually happens]
Spam of the above three lines 

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]
All the time.
